titles.title: Rise Up, O Men of God

properties.copyright: Â© The Presbyterian Outlook, Richmond, VA

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rise up, O men of God! Have done with lesser things; Give heart and mind and soul and strength To serve the King of kings.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Rise up, O men of God! His Kingdom tarries long; Bring in the day of brotherhood And end the night of wrong.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Rise up, O men of God! The Church for you doth wait, Her strength unequal to her task; Rise up, and make her great!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Lift high the cross of Christ! Tread where His feet have trod; As brothers of the Son of man, Rise up, O men of God!
